extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).

basic.description: An examination of the major theoretical debates and issues in contemporary globalization, including the historical roots of globalization, and the impact of globalization on culture, economics, trade, global governance, and global social movements.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Politics of Globalization
